name: pjvi
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(cort, c1))), wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), co(c0, cva, c2)), c0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(cort, c1))), wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), co(c0, cva, c2)), c0))
-| wcel(c1, cch)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cfv(cort, c1))), wceq(cfv(cfv(cpjh, c1), co(c0, cva, c2)), c0))
-| wcel(c1, cch)

comment: The value of a projection in terms of components. (Contributed by NM, 28-Nov-2000.) (New usage is discouraged.)
